name: Broken Sword II: The Smoking Mirror
summary: While investigating a ruthless drug gang, journalist Nico Collard unexpectedly comes across an ancient artifact. Little can she know that the ornately carved obsidian stone will lead her, and her adventuring companion George Stobbart, into a mysterious escapade of intrigue and deceit - can they overcome powerful forces who will stop at nothing to fulfill their evil ambitions?
